name: Moonlight Tales: Maize Escape
description: You are Amirah Al-Badr, a young heroine on a journey to a great land; while you are travelling, you are interrupted and captured by killer corn, led by the sinister King Maize, who wants to take over the world to turn it into one giant corn and they intend to sacrifice you! You obviously don't want that, so you decide to break out of prison and fight the evil corn monsters by traversing large mazes and fighting King Corn and his vegetable cronies!
